ygData.subject: Re: Group or Solo
ygData.msgSnippet: ... equal ... Legionnaire ... by ... Oracles never impressed me much (well, okay, at level 7 or 8 they did in E.C.)  On the other hand, bandit spell-casters
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Interestingly I have far less trouble with spellcasters than I do with
equal
>conning bruisers. I take three bubbles of damage against a blue
Legionnaire
>minimum, two or less if against a blue Oracle. Course, they don't get off
>very many spells with me hitting them with Crookstinger sped up even more
by
>warsong or Anthem. I've seen green oracles kill warriors with 2hdd swords,
>while I at a leel lowere could kill the same oracle and take less than a
>bubble. Speed really does kill casters.
>
>Kitasi
>


Oracles never impressed me much (well, okay, at level 7 or 8
they did in E.C.) On the other hand, bandit spell-casters seem
to spawn in two's in West Karanas. At a camp of 6, it's not
uncommon to see 4 blue to green (to a 15) casters. Even the
green casters tend to resist Lament very often, and suddenly
you're getting nuked, hard. You can die in a hurry in those
cases (and all I wanted was that green lady with the sword!!)
